full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 206 of 228 882 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct messages were not taken or put -- Q. My question for you, Mr. Alessi, is just whether you recognize the handwriting, okay? A. Yes. Okay. The first one is my wife. The second one, I don't know, this is not my writing. The third one is my writing. The four one is not my writing. And the last one is my writing. Q. And what about the next page? A. Next page is my writing, my writing, my writing, my writing. Q. And the next page? A. This is my wife's writing, the next one is my writing, my wife's writing, and my writing. Q. How about the next page? A. This is my wife's writing, my, my wife's writing, and my writing. Q. And the next page? A. Mine, mine, this one I don't recognize it, and this one is blank. Q. The next page? A. This one is mine. This one is -- I don't recognize this. This -- I don't recognize this, this, and the last one I don't recognize. Q. And how about the next page? A. The first one, I don't recognize it. The second one is SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018079
